name: Can't Stop The Pop
description:
This is a prototype/alpha release for OPE! 2019.
There is only one level, and there are some bugs with hitboxes and graphics.

Touch/Left Mouse Button/Space to attach rope
Release to let go

Demo made by one person in less than six hours, using GDevelop.
The background music is "Blueberry", the twelfth track on Coast To Coast
